members.id:
Bird.fly(symbol, number) -> bool
Bird.fly(string, number) -> bool
members.title: fly
members.comment:
Flying is the most critical feature of birds.

Example¶ ↑

fly(:south, 70)
members.code: # File example.rb, line 49 def fly(direction, velocity) if RUBY_PLATFORM == 'java' _fly_jruby(direction, velocity) else puts "flying away: direction=#{direction}, velocity=#{velocity}" end end

classes.title: Duck
classes.comment:
A duck is a Waterfowl Bird.

Features:

bird::

  * speak
  * fly

waterfowl::

  * swim

members.title: speak
members.code: # File example.rb, line 82 def speak speech = quack yield speech end

members.title: quack
members.code: # File example.rb, line 88 def quack 'quack' end

members.title: useful?
members.comment: Checks if this duck is a useful one.
members.code: # File example.rb, line 126 def useful? @domestic || @rubber end

members.title: rubber_ducks
members.code: # File example.rb, line 111 def self.rubber_ducks @@rubber_ducks end

members.title: new
members.code: # File example.rb, line 116 def initialize(domestic, rubber) @domestic = domestic @rubber = rubber @@rubber_ducks << self if rubber end

members.title: swim
members.code: # File example.rb, line 19 def swim puts 'swimming around' end
